name: Marvelous Monster Mischief
description:
Welcome to Marvelous Monster Mischief! Customize Your own square Monster, play with it and share it with friends! 😎 🤪 😎  

Marvelous Monster Mischief is a colorful and chaotic game in which you can customize Your own Monster with various items and create your personal Monster design. 

Choose between three different game modes to earn Monchos which let You unlock new items for your Monster customization.

Share Your own Monster designs and game scores with friends across all social platforms!

The game features seasonal themes and limited items that consist of seasonal periods and events such as Halloween, Christmas etc...
Each new season awards You with bonus Monchos!

FEATURES

  •  Three game modes (More to come soon!)
  •  Over 200 different items for designing Your monster the way You want!
  •  Sharing Your scores and designs on any social platform
  •  Seasonal Themes and Items
  •  Google Play Games achievements and leaderboards
